text:
When using WARP between Apache and Tomcat, with a multi-part HTTP upload, the 
system causes an exception when we try to upload a SWF (perhaps any binary 
file). In this same configuration, text file uploading works properly. 

Using a proxy connection between Apache and Tomcat, under the same conditions 
otherwise, text files and SWF files both upload properly. 

Therefore, it seems we're seeing a problem with WARP taking a binary file 
transfer using an HTTP multi-part request.
creator: Kevin.Elliott@Paramount.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4930 ***
creator: pier@betaversion.org
